(\{ (\{ "=2", "+\", "+\", "+\", "+\\Welcome to the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site. This game is currently being developed by Khalea Henderson and the rest of the Team. Ironclaw is an anthropomorphic RPG, based on the table top game of the same name, by \Sanguine\. It is a world which revolves around intrigue, guilds and religion. To add spice to life, there is magic, gunpowder and the first printing press. \To learn about our team, please refer to the Staff Area below.\\\", "+ \ \ \ \ \  \", "+ ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  \\\\", "+ \ \ \  \", "+ \ \ \ \ \  \\", "+ \ \ \ \ \  \\December has arrived!\\\Yes, December is finally ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  here. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  systems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal, the ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and help out ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  as much as they are capable of.\TonyD has been working diligently on ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  the combat system and I have to say it looks and feels right. Abi has ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  continued her efforts to keep up on new maps including all the small ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  changes I requested of her. Quo has requested we all submit our plot ideas ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  in the Twiki \templates\ ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  and has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  pupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  delayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  her for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  Marketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very cool ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet intriguing ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday, learning new ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  things, making more NPCs and a few other objects. On my part, I have done ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my spare moments (which ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  are few and far between). Yay, me.\On a more personal note, Maya ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due to personal commitments and ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  health issues. I wont go into detail since it is not my intention to share ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  personal subjects but I ask that you all pray for her and wish her a quick ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  return. Thank you. \Hope to see you InGame. (\{ (\{ "=6", "+\", "+\\\\", "+\", "+\\", "+\\December has arrived!\\\Yes, December is finally here. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more systems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal, the faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and help out as much as they are capable of.\TonyD has been working diligently on the combat system and I have to say it looks and feels right. Abi has continued her efforts to keep up on new maps including all the small changes I requested of her. Quo has requested we all submit our plot ideas in the Twiki \templates\ and has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest pupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were delayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame her for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the Marketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very cool secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet intriguing details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday, learning new things, making more NPCs and a few other objects. On my part, I have done my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my spare moments (which are few and far between). Yay, me.\On a more personal note, Maya (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due to personal commitments and health issues. I wont go into detail since it is not my intention to share personal subjects but I ask that you all pray for her and wish her a quick return. Thank you. \Hope to see you InGame. You may reach me directly Death the frosty dragon. \RAWR!\ \-- \AngeloMangione\ - 01 Dec 2005 ", "=1", "+ \ \ \ \ \  \\This Month's TOP Goals:\\\*Create a \Staff ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  Character\ for use in Alpha. \*Update your Twiki/IC personal page \here\.\*Complete ", "+ \ \ \ \ \  full descriptions for all of your current structures in Alpha Docktown. ", "+\", "-\\Welcome to the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site. This game is currently being developed by Khalea Henderson and the rest of the Team. Ironclaw is an anthropomorphic RPG, based on the table top game of the same name, by \Sanguine\. It is a world which revolves around intrigue, guilds and religion. To add spice to life, there is magic, gunpowder and the first printing press. \To learn about our team, please refer to the Staff Area below.\\\", "+\\Welcome\\r\\nto the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more systems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal, the faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and help out as much as they are capable of.\TonyD has been working diligently on the combat system and I have to say it looks and feels right. Abi has continued her efforts to keep up on new maps including all the small changes I requested of her. Quo has requested we all submit our plot ideas in the Twiki \templates\ and has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest pupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were delayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame her for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the Marketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very cool secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet intriguing details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday, learning new things, making more NPCs and a few other objects. On my part, I have done my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my spare moments (which are few and far between). Yay, me.\On a more personal note, Maya (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due to personal commitments and health issues. I wont go into detail since it is not my intention to share personal subjects but I ask that you all pray for her and wish her a quick return. Thank you. \Hope to see you InGame. ", "-\", "-\\Welcome\\r\\nto the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site. This game\\r\\nis currently being developed by Khalea Henderson and the rest of the\\r\\nTeam. Ironclaw is an anthropomorphic RPG, based on the table top game\\r\\nof the same name, by \Sanguine\. It is a world which revolves around\\r\\nintrigue, guilds and religion. To learn about our\\r\\nteam, please refer to the Staff Area\\r\\nbelow.\\\

\", "-\\December\\r\\nhas arrived!\\
\Yes, December is finally\\r\\nhere. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more\\r\\nsystems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal,\\r\\nthe faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and\\r\\nhelp out as much as they are capable of.\
TonyD has been\\r\\nworking diligently on the combat system and I have to say it looks and\\r\\nfeels right. Abi has continued her efforts to keep up on new maps\\r\\nincluding all the small changes I requested of her. Quo has requested\\r\\nwe all submit our plot ideas in the Twiki \templates\\\r\\nand has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest\\r\\npupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were\\r\\ndelayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame\\r\\nher for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the\\r\\nMarketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very\\r\\ncool secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet\\r\\nintriguing details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday,\\r\\nlearning new things, making more NPCs and a few other objects. On my\\r\\npart, I have done my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my\\r\\nspare moments (which are few and far between). Yay, me.\
On a\\r\\nmore personal note, Maya (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due\\r\\nto personal commitments and health issues. I wont go into detail since\\r\\nit is not my intention to share personal subjects but I ask that you\\r\\nall pray for her and wish her a quick return. Thank you. \
Hope\\r\\nto see you InGame. You may reach me directly Death the frosty dragon.\\r\\n\RAWR!\ \

(\{ (\{ "=3", "+ \", "+ \", "+ \
", "+ \\Welcome to the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site.\  This game is currently being developed by Khalea Henderson and the rest of the Team.\  Ironclaw is an anthropomorphic RPG, based on the table top game of the same name, by \Sanguine\. It is a world which revolves around intrigue, guilds and religion. To add spice to life, there is magic, gunpowder and the first printing press. \ To learn about our team, please refer to the Staff Area below.\\\", "+ ---------------------------------------", "+ \\  \ \\", "+ \", "=1", "- ", "+ \\December has arrived!\\\", "- I have no doubt that Angelo can put this page to better use than me.", "+ Yes, December is finally here. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more systems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal, the faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and help out as much as they are capable of.\ \TonyD has been working diligently on the combat system and I have to say it looks and feels right. Abi has continued her efforts to keep up on new maps including all the small changes I requested of her. Quo has requested we all submit our plot ideas in the \Twiki [[PlotLines_][templates]] and has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest pupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were delayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame her for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the Marketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very cool secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet intriguing details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday, learning new things, making more \NPCs and a few other objects. On my part, I have done my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my spare moments (which are few and far between). Yay, me.\", "+ On a more personal note, Maya (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due to personal commitments and health issues. I wont go into detail since it is not my intention to share personal subjects but I ask that you all pray for her and wish her a quick return. Thank you. \", "+ Hope to see you \InGame. You may reach me directly as Death the frosty dragon. *RAWR!* \", "+ -- Main.AngeloMangione - 01 Dec 2005", "+ --------------------------------", "+ \\This Month's TOP Goals:\\\", "+ *Create a [[StaffBody_][Staff Character]] for use in Alpha. \", "+ *Update your Twiki/IC personal page [[StaffArea_][here]].\", "+ *Complete full descriptions for all of your current structures in Alpha Docktown. Refer to [[IcCentralDocktown_][Central Docktown]] or [[IcNorthernDocktown_][Northern Docktown]] for listings. Seek out a team leader (Redvixen, Azrael, Quo or Death) to determine what projects are available and which you would enjoy. \", "+ *Plots, Quests and more Plots. We can use any ideas you have. Please submit them using these [[PlotLines_][templates]]. ", "+ \\Welcome to the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site.\  This game is currently being developed by Khalea Henderson and the rest of the Team.\  Ironclaw is an anthropomorphic RPG, based on the table top game of the same name, by \Sanguine\. It is a world which revolves around intrigue, guilds and religion. To add spice to life, there is magic, gunpowder and the first printing press. \ To learn about our team, please refer to the Staff Area below.\\\", "+ ---------------------------------------", "+ \\  \ \\", "+ \", "+ ", "+ \\December has arrived!\\\", "+ Yes, December is finally here. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more systems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal, the faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and help out as much as they are capable of.\ \TonyD has been working diligently on the combat system and I have to say it looks and feels right. Abi has continued her efforts to keep up on new maps including all the small changes I requested of her. Quo has requested we all submit our plot ideas in the \Twiki [PlotLines_\|templates] and has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest pupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were delayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame her for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the Marketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very cool secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet intriguing details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday, learning new things, making more \NPCs and a few other objects. On my part, I have done my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my spare moments (which are few and far between). Yay, me.\", "+ On a more personal note, Maya (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due to personal commitments and health issues. I wont go into detail since it is not my intention to share personal subjects but I ask that you all pray for her and wish her a quick return. Thank you. \", "+ Hope to see you \InGame. You may reach me directly as Death the frosty dragon. *RAWR!* \", "+ -- Main.AngeloMangione - 01 Dec 2005", "+ --------------------------------", "+ \\This Month's TOP Goals:\\\", "+ *Create a [[StaffBody_][Staff Character]] for use in Alpha. \", "+ *Update your Twiki/IC personal page [[StaffArea_][here]].\", "+ *Complete full descriptions for all of your current structures in Alpha Docktown. "\\Also see [skotos.index_\|the skotos web].\\ \ \\\\\\\
\\\\Welcome\\r\\nto the Ironclaw development pages on the Skotos TWiki Site. This game\\r\\nis currently being developed by Khalea Henderson and the rest of the\\r\\nTeam. Ironclaw is an anthropomorphic RPG, based on the table top game\\r\\nof the same name, by \Sanguine\. It is a world which revolves around\\r\\nintrigue, guilds and religion. To add spice to life, there is magic,\\r\\ngunpowder and the first printing press. \To learn about our\\r\\nteam, please refer to the Staff Area\\r\\nbelow.\\\\\\\\\\\\\
\\\December\\r\\nhas arrived!\\\Yes, December is finally\\r\\nhere. Do we feel ready to open Alpha? Its close. We have a few more\\r\\nsystems and objects to create yet. The more working towards this goal,\\r\\nthe faster we can reach an opening day. I urge everyone to login and\\r\\nhelp out as much as they are capable of.\TonyD has been\\r\\nworking diligently on the combat system and I have to say it looks and\\r\\nfeels right. Abi has continued her efforts to keep up on new maps\\r\\nincluding all the small changes I requested of her. Quo has requested\\r\\nwe all submit our plot ideas in the Twiki \templates\\\r\\nand has a few very interesting plans of his own. Welcome to our newest\\r\\npupil, Maya! She has been with us for some time but her powers were\\r\\ndelayed until recently. Lalita has been tied up with school (cant blame\\r\\nher for that) but with just a little help, she has finished the\\r\\nMarketplace courtyard. Atama has toiled and learned to create a very\\r\\ncool secret room in the northen warehouse with many small yet\\r\\nintriguing details. Go take a look. Burcu is here almost everyday,\\r\\nlearning new things, making more NPCs and a few other objects. On my\\r\\npart, I have done my best to institute a feasible fishing system in my\\r\\nspare moments (which are few and far between). Yay, me.\On a\\r\\nmore personal note, Maya (Hemiko) may be decreasing her time here due\\r\\nto personal commitments and health issues. I wont go into detail since\\r\\nit is not my intention to share personal subjects but I ask that you\\r\\nall pray for her and wish her a quick return. Thank you. \Hope\\r\\nto see you InGame. You may reach me directly Death the frosty dragon.\\r\\n\RAWR!\ \-- \AngeloMangione\\\r\\n- 01 Dec 2005 \ \\\\This Month's TOP\\r\\nGoals:\\\*Create a \Staff\\r\\nCharacter\ for use in Alpha. \*Update your Twiki/IC\\r\\npersonal page \here\.\*Complete\\r\\nfull descriptions for all of your current structures in Alpha Docktown.\\r\\nRefer to \Central\\r\\nDocktown\ or \Northern\\r\\nDocktown\ for listings. Seek out a team leader (Redvixen,\\r\\nAzrael, Quo or Death) to determine what projects are available and\\r\\nwhich you would enjoy. \*Plots, Quests and more Plots. We can\\r\\nuse any ideas you have. Please submit them using these \templates\.\\r\\nThank you.\\ \\r\\n\
\\\\\\\A small note to all newcomers:\\r\\nPlease review and sign the \Staff\\r\\nRules\ page.\\\\
